CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Automatic Updates
CheckBoxPreference.android:summaryOn: Automatic updates will occur as specified.

EditTextPreference.android:title: Data fresh time (mins)
EditTextPreference.android:summary: If you add a new widget or restart the phone, and the data is newer than this, the scheduled update will be skipped.

PreferenceScreen.android:title: Network settings
PreferenceScreen.android:summary: Change the criteria for when an automatic update will be allowed

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Wifi Updates
CheckBoxPreference.android:summaryOn: Automatic updates will occur when connected to wifi
CheckBoxPreference.android:summaryOff: Automatic updates will not occur when connected to wifi

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: 2Degrees Data updates
CheckBoxPreference.android:summaryOn: Automatic updates will occur when on the 2Degrees data network
CheckBoxPreference.android:summaryOff: Automatic updates will not occur when on the 2Degrees data network

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Roaming Data updates
CheckBoxPreference.android:summaryOn: Automatic updates will occur when roaming (eg national data)
CheckBoxPreference.android:summaryOff: Automatic updates will not occur while roaming (eg national data)

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Obey Background Data Setting
CheckBoxPreference.android:summaryOn: Automatic updates will occur only when background data is enabled.
CheckBoxPreference.android:summaryOff: Automatic updates will occur even if background data is disabled.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Obey Auto Sync Setting
CheckBoxPreference.android:summaryOn: Automatic updates will occur only when auto syncing is enabled.
CheckBoxPreference.android:summaryOff: Automatic updates will occur even if auto sync is disabled
